attributes.action: Conduct an informed 2nd Referendum which provides voters with multiple options.
attributes.additional_details: The first referendum is widely held to be a sham and cannot support the direction of a nation, therefore. It lacks legitimacy and scope.
attributes.background: More options in the vote, so as not to divide people so much. Better wording on options than 1st ref. Multiple choices to help guide outcomes. The 2nd referendum will be drastically different after the electorate have developed their own stances with more debate and perspective.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.  We're not sure what questions you would like to be decided by this referendum.
